title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water.
Beat the eggs with grated parmesan and pepper.
Drain the pasta and mix quickly with pancetta and egg mixture.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and tikka masala paste for 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken pieces until golden.
Cook onions until soft, then add tomato puree.
Add chicken and cream, simmer until cooked through.
